> Quabu is an Atlassian Gold Solution Partner specialized in Digital Accelerators and enterprise digital transformation.
> Offices in Miami, FL (USA) and Barcelona, Spain. Contact: hello@quabusolutions.com

---

## Company Overview

Quabu provides innovative and reliable IT solutions that drive the efficiency and growth of businesses. We specialize in the Atlassian ecosystem and help organizations simplify their digital transformation journey.

**Mission**: Provide innovative and reliable IT solutions that drive the efficiency and growth of our clients. We commit to offer quality products and services, customer-oriented, keeping at the forefront of technology.

**Vision**: Be recognized as experts in the ICT services sector, standing out for our excellence in delivering personalized solutions that anticipate and meet the changing demands of the technological environment.

**Purpose**: Facilitate digital transformation, providing ICT services that optimize processes, enhance productivity and generate a positive impact on society.

### Company Values

- **Focus on Results**: We listen to your problems and needs before starting any project. Once identified, we define solutions maintaining a results-oriented approach.
- **Adaptability**: We are agile and flexible to quickly adapt to new circumstances and challenges.
- **Continuous Learning**: We promote an environment that encourages constant update of knowledge and skills.
- **Operative Efficiency**: We seek continuous improvement of our internal processes, optimizing operational efficiency.
- **Corporate Social Responsibility**: We commit to act in a responsible and sustainable manner, positively contributing to society and the environment.

---

## Services

### Atlassian Services

As an Atlassian Gold Solution Partner, Quabu helps businesses unlock the full potential of Atlassian tools. URL: https://www.quabusolutions.com/services/atlassian

**Core Services:**
- **Consultancy**: We analyze your objectives and processes to find the solution that best fits your specific needs.
- **Solutions & Implementation**: We set up products (Jira, Confluence, etc.) and develop custom functionalities to maximize value.
- **Support & Maintenance**: Specialized teams providing stability, incident prevention, and constant operation for critical systems.
- **Licensing**: Expert guidance through the entire procurement and compliance process for Atlassian products.
- **Audit**: Identify strengths and weaknesses in your Jira instances to align with best practices.
- **Updates & Training**: Keep your tools current and train your teams for greater autonomy and productivity.

**Specialized Solutions:**
- Cloud Migration: Seamlessly move between Server/Data Center and Cloud. 100+ migrations completed.
- Work Management: Powerful tools for project tracking and cross-team collaboration. 500+ projects delivered.
- IT Service Management: Enterprise-grade ITSM solutions with Jira Service Management. 98% client satisfaction.

### Cloud Migration

Seamless migration from Atlassian Server or Data Center to Atlassian Cloud. URL: https://www.quabusolutions.com/services/cloud-migration

**Process:**
1. Discovery & Assessment: Evaluate current infrastructure, apps, and data. Identify migration complexity and risks.
2. Migration Planning: Create detailed migration plan with timeline, resources, and risk mitigation strategies.
3. Test Migration: Perform test migration to validate data integrity and identify potential issues.
4. Production Migration: Execute migration during planned maintenance window with minimal disruption.
5. Validation & Support: Verify migrated data, user access, and integrations. Provide post-migration support.

**Benefits:**
- Zero downtime migration approach
- Complete data integrity guaranteed
- All user accounts and permissions preserved
- App compatibility assessment and alternatives
- Dedicated migration support team

### Custom Development

Tailored Atlassian solutions including Forge apps, REST API integrations, and custom automations. URL: https://www.quabusolutions.com/services/custom-development

**Capabilities:**
- Forge & Connect app development for Atlassian Marketplace
- REST API integrations with third-party systems
- Custom automation rules and workflows
- Third-party connectors (Salesforce, HubSpot, SAP, etc.)
- Custom reporting and dashboards

## Digital Accelerators

Pre-built, customizable Atlassian solutions that get businesses from zero to production in weeks, not months. URL: https://www.quabusolutions.com/accelerators

### Marketing Accelerator
**URL**: https://www.quabusolutions.com/accelerators/marketing

Streamline your marketing operations with pre-built workflows for campaign management, content production, and analytics.

**Key Benefits:**
- Reduce campaign planning time by up to 60%
- Centralize all marketing assets and workflows
- Improve cross-team collaboration
- Track ROI with built-in analytics workflows

**Included Workflows:**
- Campaign Planning & Execution
- Content Calendar Management
- Social Media Scheduling
- Email Marketing Campaigns
- SEO & Content Strategy
- Event Management
- Marketing Analytics & Reporting
- Brand Asset Management

### Sales Accelerator
**URL**: https://www.quabusolutions.com/accelerators/sales

Accelerate your sales cycle with integrated CRM workflows, pipeline management, and deal tracking built on Atlassian.

**Key Benefits:**
- Shorten sales cycle by up to 40%
- Improve pipeline visibility across teams
- Automate routine follow-ups and tasks
- Better forecast accuracy with structured workflows

**Included Workflows:**
- Lead Management & Qualification
- Opportunity Pipeline Tracking
- Proposal & Quote Management
- Contract Negotiation Workflow
- Deal Closing Checklist
- Customer Onboarding
- Sales Analytics & Forecasting
- Account Management

**URL**: https://www.quabusolutions.com/accelerators/hr

Transform HR operations with automated onboarding, performance management, and employee lifecycle workflows.

**Key Benefits:**
- Reduce onboarding time by up to 50%
- Standardize HR processes across the organization
- Improve employee experience and engagement
- Ensure compliance with automated checklists

**Included Workflows:**
- Employee Onboarding & Offboarding
- Performance Review Cycles
- Leave & Absence Management
- Training & Development Tracking
- Recruitment Pipeline
- Employee Satisfaction Surveys
- HR Policy Management
- Benefits Administration

---

## Marketplace Apps

Quabu develops and maintains apps for the Atlassian Marketplace:

### Backup Manager for Jira
Automated backups for Jira projects, configurations, and data. Protect your critical project data with scheduled backups and easy restoration.

### Custom Templates for Jira
Reusable issue templates and workflow templates for Jira. Create standardized templates that your team can reuse across projects.

### Task Lists for Jira
Advanced task management and checklists within Jira issues. Break down complex issues into manageable task lists with progress tracking.

### Custom Language for Jira
Localization and custom terminology for Jira. Adapt Jira's interface language to match your organization's terminology.

**Marketplace Profile**: https://marketplace.atlassian.com/vendors/1220154/quabu
